data.title: City of Glens Falls, NY Schedules
data.meta_description: Ch 208 Art VIII  In accordance with the provisions of § 208-4, traffic control signals shall be installed at the following described intersections: Intersection Bay Street and Sanford Street Broad Street and Pine Street Broad Street and South St
data.meta_site_name: City of Glens Falls, NY Code
data.text:
Bay Street

[Added by L.L. No. 3-2006]

East

In front of 65 Bay Street

Bay Street

West

In front of the Christ Church

Bay Street

West

2 spaces in front of Liberty House

Big Cross Street

[Added ]

West

1 space in front of Big Cross Street School

Broad Street and Pine Street

North

1 temporary space in front of St. Alphonsus Church

Church Street

[Added by L.L. No. 8-2005]

West

2 spaces north of the northernmost edge of the driveway

Cooper Street

West

1 space in front of 20 Cooper Street

Glen Street

East

1 space near Crandall Library

Glen Street

[Added by L.L. No. 3-2007]

East

2 spaces immediately south of the intersection with Lapham Place

Glen Street

East

1 space north of the crosswalk in front of Scandals Nightclub

Glen Street

West

1 space north of the crosswalk in front of the Outlet Building

Grant Avenue

[Added by L.L. No. 5-2014]

South

One space on the south side of Grant Avenue in front of 484 Glen Street building, approximately 50 feet from the Glen Street corner

Maple Street

South

2 spaces near the library

Marion Avenue

[Added by L.L. No. 5-2009]

South

2 spaces on the south side of Marion Avenue in front of Temple Beth EL, 3 Marion Avenue

Pearl Street

West

2 spaces in front of the New York Telephone Company

Pine Street

[Added by L.L. No. 4-2011]

West

1 space on the west side of Pine Street in front of Dr. Gary Poster's office at 11 Pine Street

Ridge Street

[Added by L.L. No. 1-2010]

East

2 spaces immediately north of the Cronin High-rise driveway

Ridge Street

[Repealed by L.L. No. 1-2010]

South Street

[Added by L.L. No. 2-2010]

South

1 space on the south side of South Street in front of Pete's Diner, 36 South Street

Warren Street

—

1 space next to the Fountain in the City parking lot

Warren Street

North

1 space between Genpak and St. Mary's Rectory

Warren Street

[Added by L.L. No. 1-2012]

South

1 space on south side of Warren Street, in front of World Awareness Children's Museum, 89 Warren Street

Elm Street Parking Plaza

[Amended by L.L. No. 1-2009; by L.L. No. 2-2009; by L.L. No. 7-2014]

3 hrs.; 9:00 a.m. unrestricted; 6:00 p.m. to 9:00 a.m. (Note: one-way entrance only, a minimum of 15 feet in width, to the Elm Street Parking Lot off Glenn Street)

Between Elm Street, South Street, Glen Street and Exchange Street

Exchange Street Parking Plaza

[Amended by L.L. No. 1-2009; by L.L. No. 2-2009]

3 hrs.; 9:00 a.m. to 6:00 p.m.; unrestricted; 6:00 p.m. to 9:00 a.m. (Note: Parking permits will be available for Exchange Street Parking Plaza, Ridge Street Lot and Warren Street Lot. Should all available parking permits be sold for the Exchange Street, Ridge Street and Warren Street Lots, parking would be restricted only to those with paid parking permits.)

Between Exchange Street, Hudson Avenue Extension, Elm Street and Glen Street

Ridge Street Lot

[Added ; amended by L.L. No. 1-2009; by L.L. No. 2-2009]

3 hrs.; 9:00 a.m. to 5:00 p.m.; unrestricted; 5:00 p.m. to 9:00 a.m. (Note: Parking permits will be available for Exchange Street Parking Plaza, Ridge Street Lot and Warren Street Lot. Should all available parking permits be sold for the Exchange Street, Ridge Street and Warren Street Lots, parking would be restricted only to those with paid parking permits.)

Description: All parking spaces not designated and/or marked or otherwise reserved by agreement for use by adjacent property owners and/or for the official use of the City of Glens Falls lying within Tax Map Parcel 302.20-30-6 and so much of Tax Map Parcels 302.20-30-3, 7, 8, 13, 14 and 16 lying north of the boundary line between Tax Map Parcel 302.20-30-3 and lands now owned by Simonson and an extension of that line in a westerly direction

South Street Parking Plaza

[Amended by L.L. No. 3-2003]

No parking; 5:00 a.m. to 1:00 p.m./Saturday from May 1 through November 15 under or within 40 feet of the South Street Community Building (exclusive of vendors utilizing the South Street Community Building); unlimited hours 1:00 p.m. Saturday through 5:00 a.m. Saturday; unlimited hours 5:00 a.m. Saturday to 1:00 p.m. Saturday except under or within 40 feet of the South Street Community Building from May 1 through November 15; all as further limited by the Authority as defined in and pursuant to § 208-36 hereof

Public parking facility west of South Street and north of Elm Street and accessible from South Street and Elm Street

Warren Street Lot

[Amended by L.L. No. 1-2009; by L.L. No. 2-2009]

3 hrs.; 9:00 a.m. to 5:00 p.m.; unrestricted; 5:00 p.m. to 9:00 a.m. (Note: Parking permits will be available for Exchange Street Parking Plaza, Ridge Street Lot and Warren Street Lot. Should all available parking permits be sold for the Exchange Street, Ridge Street and Warren Street Lots, parking would be restricted only to those with paid parking permits.)

Between New Fountain Square, Ltd., property, the Robert J. Cronin Highrise and St. Mary's Academy
